raw_text: Dr A.N. HANIFFA – Son of Advocate Marhoom M.I.M Haniffa and Sithy Shakira Haniffa,​ Beloved Husband of Ummu Khadijathul Hafeera,​ Father of Ruvaiz and Sumaiha Hashim,​ Father-in-law of Sabira and Rafat Hashim,​ Grandfather of Ajwad,​ Shahir,​ Salma and Hafsa,​ Mariam,​ Zainab and Usama. Son-in-Law of Hon Marhoom M.H.Mohamed and Marhooma Noor Naseema. Brother of Marhoom Mohamed Nalir Haniffa,​ and Marhoom Hamid Nasir Haniffa,​ Brother-in-law of Hussain Mohamed,​ Hassen Mohamed,​ Azahim Mohamed,​ Thufathul Fathima Hameed Marhoom Haniffa Mohamed,​ Shaul Hameed and Marhooma Shaha Ariff and Marhooma Zeina and Zeeniya. Janaza leaves residence 513,​ Bauddhaloka Mawatha,​ Colombo 8 at 9:30 am for burial at Maligawatte Burial Ground.081230
